EmailTemplate.description: Template to send as a follow up to an introduction voice mail.
EmailTemplate.name: Account Management Intro - VM
EmailTemplate.subject: Per my voice mail - Account Management services at WEX Fleet One
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
My name is {!Account.OwnerFullName} and I am the Account Manager at WEX Fleet One assigned to help make sure you get the most out of your WEX Fleet One Account.
Per my voice mail, I not only wanted to introduce myself, but also make certain you were aware of everything WEX Fleet One can can offer you to manage your company's vehicles.
Factoring – Accelerated Cash Flow, Powerful Real-Time Reporting, Fuel Card Funding and Flexible Pricing Structure with no hidden fees.
WEX Fuel Management – Fuel solutions for wholesalers, retailers, fleets with onsite or bulk fuel, and those buying fuel on the road.
Permits - Purchase the necessary temporary permits your drivers need including Trip, Fuel, and Oversize/Overweight.
Telematics – An easy-to-use fleet vehicle tracking solution that helps you monitor fuel use and driver behavior - anytime, anywhere.
Cash Services – Cash Advances. ATM access. PlusChek® Services. And more.
Do you have vehicles in your fleet with less than 18 wheels? WEX Fleet One has got you covered. We offer feature-packed savings for your gasoline vehicles too!
I'll be reaching out to you again in the coming weeks to see what we can do for you. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!Account.OwnerPhone} from 8 AM to 5 PM Central or via email at {!Account.OwnerEmail}. You can also contact our 24 hour a day Customer Care department at 800-359-7587.
Thank you for your time and your business! I look forward to speaking to you in the near future.
Sincerely,
{!Account.OwnerFullName}
{!Account.OwnerTitle}
{!Account.OwnerPhone}
